TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProtocolReflector extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供各种通信协议的公共功能，以从标识为 Web 服务的类创建 对象。

span.span: Provides common functionality across communication protocols for creating objects from classes that are identified as Web services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象 类及其具体派生类 从用特性标识为 Web 服务的类创建对象 。The abstract class and its concrete derived classes create objects from classes that are identified as Web services with the attribute. 每个具体 派生类都会 根据指定的通信协议生成对象; 无论使用哪种协议，都提供通用功能。Each concrete -derived class generates objects according to a specified communication protocol; provides common functionality regardless of the protocol. 输出 实例可用于使用 方法或可用重载之一生成 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档。An output instance can be used to generate a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document with the method or one of the available overloads. 类和相关类也可以使用该实例 来生成客户端代理代码或抽象服务器代码。The instance can also be used by the class and related classes to generate client proxy code or abstract server code. 类使用 为 它在 Web 服务类中标识的每个绑定创建一个。The class uses the to create a for each binding it identifies in the Web service class. 如果该属性不存在，则 该类将为整个类创建一个绑定。If that attribute is not present, the class creates a single binding for the entire class. 对于每个 Web 服务方法 (Web 服务类中的一个方法，该方法与属于绑定的) 出现在一起 ，派生自的类将 生成一个操作以及添加到对象的关联消息 。For each Web service method (a method in the Web service class appearing with the ) belonging to a binding, a class derived from generates an operation and associated messages that are added to the object. 通常，开发人员通过类间接使用这些类 ，而不是直接调用派生自的类 。Typically, a developer uses these classes indirectly through the class, instead of directly invoking classes derived from .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription GetServiceDescription(string ns) cil managed
Public Function GetServiceDescription (ns As String) As ServiceDescription

param.name: ns
param.span: 随后获取的 实例将使用与 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 实体（该实体从输入 Web 服务类反射）对应的对象来填充。

span.span: The instance obtained subsequently gets populated with objects that correspond to Web Services Description Language (WSDL) entities that are reflected from the input Web service class.

summary.span: 获取给定的 XML 命名空间和适用的通信协议的 对象。

span.span: A object for a given XML namespace and the applicable communication protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 随后获取的 实例会填充与从输入 Web 服务类反射的 WSDL 实体对应的对象。The instance obtained subsequently gets populated with objects that correspond to WSDL entities that are reflected from the input Web service class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类 为每个具有不同命名空间的绑定创建一个对象，该对象在 Web 服务类中找到。The class creates a object for each binding, with a distinct namespace, that it finds in a Web service class.
